appraisal.reason: According to the newsletter, weekday Confession is 12.00–12.20pm and Sunday Confession is 10.00–10.30am and 12.00–12.30pm. However, on Saturdays the evening Confession ends at 5.50pm, not 6.00pm. Please note the official Saturday Confession times are 10.00–11.00am and 5.00–5.50pm.

According to this newsletter, Confession is Monday to Friday from 12:15pm to 12:40pm and on Saturday from 5:30pm to 5:55pm, with no Confession listed on Sunday. The weekday start time is 12:15pm (not 12:00pm) and the Saturday end time is 5:55pm (not 6:00pm). Please refer to these official times when planning your visit.

name: Our Lady of Mount Carmel & St Simon Stock

appraisal.reason: Per the bulletin, Sunday confessions are heard fifteen minutes before every Mass, not simply 'before every Mass.' Weekday confessions are 12:00–12:55 (Mon–Fri) and Saturdays are 11:00–12:00 and 17:45–17:55, as stated.

According to this bulletin, confessions are heard for half an hour before all Masses, or by appointment. This includes weekdays before the 1:05 pm Masses, as well as before the Monday 6:30 pm Mass, the Saturday 6:00 pm Vigil, and the Sunday Masses. Therefore, they are not limited to Monday and Wednesday–Friday at 12:35–13:05. Please consult the posted Mass times to determine the corresponding confession periods.
